Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering      Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering   Main Menu    Undergraduate           Admitted Students    Admissions    Accreditation    Courses    ME Major    IE Major    EM Major    Minors    Internships and Jobs    Student Groups    Student Profiles    Student Resources         Graduate           Admissions    Courses    International Programs    Master’s Programs    PhD Programs    PhD Dissertations    Post-Graduation Outcomes    Student Profiles    Student Resources         Research           Research Areas    Labs         Faculty and Staff           Department Head    Core Faculty    Affiliate Faculty    Emeritus Faculty    Staff    Open Positions         News           Department Seminars    News         About           Mechanical Engineering    Industrial Engineering    Energy Engineering    Advisory Board    Contact    Head's Message          Eyebrow menu    Giving    Alumni    College of Engineering Home    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering    Undergraduate programs    Undergraduate Student Organizations        Undergraduate Student Organizations  There are seven organizations that are especially interesting to undergraduate students majoring in mechanical engineering, industrial engineering, or engineering management. This page describes these groups and provides links to their sites.  As a UIC Engineering student, you also have the opportunity to join student organizations that are housed in the College’s other five departments. You can find them all here . Don’t forget that as a UIC student, you also can propose and create a student organization that you don’t see on this list.      student orgs           American Institute of Aeronautics and Astronautics  Members design and build remote-controlled aircraft, high-powered rockets, and quad-copters.             ASHRAE  ASHRAE promotes advancements in heating, ventilating, air conditioning, and refrigerating.             American Society of Mechanical Engineers  A professional organization for mechanical engineers that provides networking, employment opportunities, and more.             Engineering Design Team  Build robots for competition against other college teams from around the country.             Institute of Industrial and Systems Engineers  A professional organization that includes more than 15,000 industrial engineers worldwide.             Pi Tau Sigma  The national honor society for students of mechanical engineering.             Society of Automotive Engineers  Design, manufacture, test, and race two kinds of cars: a Formula-style car and an off-road mini Baja vehicle.               College-wide student organizations  Visit our college-wide student organizations page for information about other UIC College of Engineering student organizations, including interdisciplinary groups such as the National Association of Black Engineers, Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers, Society of Women Engineers, and Veterans in Engineering.
